doc.name: passKey

syntax.example: set the passKey of stack to passwordString

doc.summary: Enters a password for a locked stack, letting the user modify the stack.

examples.example: set the passKey of this stack to field "Challenge"

description.p: Use the passKey property to unlock a password-protected stack.
The passKey of a stack is a string.
By default, the passKey property of newly created stacks is set to empty.

If a stack has been locked against modification with a password, you can set the passKey property of the stack to the correct password to unlock the stack. Setting the passKey property is the script equivalent of typing the password into LiveCode's password dialog box. Use this property if you want to perform password authentication in a handler.
